overview: Recorded at the Komedia Theatre, Brighton. Robert presents a lecture using computer graphics about the new software package - Woman Wizard.  This revolutionary software consists of a virtual girlfriend/wife, so that men can dry-run awkward situations on the PC before having to face them in the flesh. Using case studies such a redecorating the flat, getting a stiffy in the bath, shrinking her favourite top in the wash and so on.
tagline: Don't Change Your Wife, Change Your Life!
title: Woman Wizard
